message: I propose a fair split - 90% for me and 10% for you. Let's get this over with quickly!
I'm willing to give you a small chunk, but I think 20% is a more reasonable share for me.
Okay, let's try a more even split. I'll take 60%, you take 40%. This is my final offer before inflation hits again.
I'm still not convinced a 40% share is fair. I'll give you a bit more, but I think 45% is the maximum I'm willing to go.
